channel.title: Dedicated servers? Can anyone help me?
channel.description:
Well, my mate wants to get a dedicated server for his server. So he can run it 24/7 etc.
But he dosn't want to spend much; I don't know much about dedi servers, so can anyone give me a link to a site which they are cheapish, he only needs a basic one really, his server normally has like 20 people max on it?
Thanks

item.title: Dedicated servers? Can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Try using google, will probably find the best result there.

Read full topic
